mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_activity where id in
#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, editTime=#{editTime}, editBy=#{editBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.id=#{id}
select car.id, u.name owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id=car.activityId where car.clueId=#{clueId}

select a.id,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in( select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId} )
select a.id,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%'
